alert.note: Alert for Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 4:32PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central St. Tammany Parish in southeastern Louisiana and southwestern Pearl River Counties through 445 PM CST... At 432 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bush, or 13 miles west of Picayune, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Picayune, Sun and Bush. This includes Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 2 and 5. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
